details.description:
Linda is Business Manager in the Digital team (@CoopDigital) of The Co-operative Group. The Co-operative Group is one of the world’s largest consumer co-operatives, owned by more than eight million members. The Group is a recognised leader for its social goals and community-led programmes.

Linda was formerly a senior technology adviser and head of open standards at the UK’s Government Digital Service, where she developed and implemented the Open Standards Principles. She was also responsible for international engagement relating to open standards and interoperability of public sector technology.
details.excerpt: Linda is Business Manager in the Digital team (@CoopDigital) of [The Co-operative Group](http://www.co-operative.coop/corporate/). The Co-operative Group is one of the world’s largest consumer co-operatives, owned by more than eight million members. The Group is a recognised leader for its social goals and community-led programmes.
details.role: Business Manager, Digital at The Co-operative Group
